subject: Re: [junit] Linkage Error
msgSnippet: I m running JDK 1.3, and I m not sure what bootstraping xml-apis.jar means... ... __________________________________________________ Do you Yahoo!? Yahoo!
messageBody:
I'm running JDK 1.3, and I'm not sure what
"bootstraping xml-apis.jar" means...


--- Jason Rogers <jacaetevha@...> wrote:
> On Wed, 2003-03-19 at 12:04, Mr james asher wrote:
>
> If you're referring to the Document.class file, no
> it
> is not included in any other jar on the classpath,
> other than the xml-apis.jar. The fact that I'm
> using
> jwebunit on top of junit shouldn't have anything to
> do
> with it, right?
>
> I am replying with:
>
> Not sure if jwebunit has anything to do with it or
> not. But it's a good
> start. Also, what version of the JDK are you using?
> You may need to
> bootstrap the xml-apis.jar...
>
> =jason
>
>
